column1: What document established the first governing document of the United States of America, which lasted from 1777-1789?
In the Articles of Confederation, what was the one branch of government established?
In Congress under the Articles of Confederation, how many states had to agree to agree to enact a law?
Under the Articles of Confederation, how many states had to agree to go to war or sign a treaty?
Under the Articles of Confederation, how many states were needed to agree to change the Articles of Confederation?
What established how the Northwest would be admitted into the U.S?
column2: It prohibited slavery. The Northwest Ordinance of 1787

column1: What established how the Southwest would be admitted into the U.S?
column2: It allowed slavery. The Southwest Ordinance of 1789
